Good Comments: Good typesetting, paying extremely close attention to release material to try and keep all the non-japanese phrases correct.

Commie =  faster & liberal but still accurate (no memes; ignore the blind hate). H&D = literal. Pick your poison. Commie played with a short dialogue exchange in ep 1 a bit (wasn't far of the mark though), but aside from that they've been serious about it
Bad Comments: Best subs available for this show.
Great translations without some of the mistakes Commie made in the first seasons and keep now. (See Heavenrend)
They actually translate instead of peppering in memes and sexual innuendos and calling it a day

Subbed Projects.Show Name: Senki Zesshou Symphogear GX: Senki Zesshou Shinai Symphogear
